description: This file defines a React functional component called TopNav, which renders a top navigation bar for a web application. It includes branding, a search input, navigation links, theme toggle, and quick action buttons.

methods.name: TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with branding, search bar, navigation links, theme toggle, and action buttons. Accepts props for handling chat, notifications, and quick actions.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick }) {$/

ctags.name: isDark
ctags.pattern: /^          aria-label={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}$/

ctags.name: isDark
ctags.pattern: /^          title={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}$/

fields.name: aria-label={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}
title={isDark ? 'Cambiar a modo claro' : 'Cambiar a modo oscuro'}
